text: A universal bank of which the Commissioner takes possession or which is operating under restrictions imposed by the Commissioner may be permitted by the Commissioner to resume business in accordance with the provisions of this chapter and subject to such conditions as may be imposed by the Commissioner.

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Commissioner Possession, Receivership, Conservatorship, and Liquidation of Universal Banks

heading.catch_text: Resumption of business by a universal bank.
